text: Marie-Hélène Beaulieu (born 1979) is a Canadian glass artist. She was born in Rouyn-Noranda, Quebec. She studied at the Centre des métiers du verre du Québec.https://www.lapresse.ca/maison/decoration/201306/11/01-4660026-la- patience-du-souffleur-de-verre.php Her work is included in the collections of the Musée national des beaux-arts du Québechttps://collections.mnbaq.org/fr/oeuvre/600046477 and the Montreal Museum of Fine Artshttps://www.mbam.qc.ca/en/works/79551/ ==References== Category:1979 births Category:21st-century Canadian women artists Category:Glass artists Category:Living people
title: Marie-Hélène Beaulieu
